meanings.sent1: The bigwig in charge of the company made all the decisions.
meanings.sent2: The bigwig at the meeting was the CEO.
meanings.sent3: The bigwig at the party was the one with the fancy hat.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a bigwig when she walked into the room full of admirers.
meanings.sent5: The bigwig's presence commanded attention wherever they went.

meanings.definition: A person in a position of authority or power.
meanings.sent1: The bigwig in the government signed the new law into effect.
meanings.sent2: The bigwig of the organization was respected by all.
meanings.sent3: The bigwig of the school was the principal who always wore a bow tie.
meanings.sent4: He acted like a bigwig, giving orders to everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The bigwig's office was filled with luxurious furniture and expensive art.
